welcome.title: Welcome, We are
welcome.mission: Our mission is to empower businesses with tailored high-quality outsourcing solutions that drive growth and efficiency.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Empowering your digital journey with comprehensive solutions and expert teams

fullStartupTeam.title: Full Startup Team Deployment
fullStartupTeam.description: We provide a dedicated team to rapidly execute your startup idea, from inception to end-user delivery. Our projects range from CRM systems to AI-integrated solutions.

specializedTalent.title: Specialized Talent Augmentation
specializedTalent.description: If you already have a team and need to hire engineers, UI/UX designers, etc., we provide the specialized talent you need to enhance your project.

global.title: Our Global Presence and Client Success Stories
global.subtitle: Go along with RabitoEng
global.description: Beyond the worldwide with our fascinating services
global.content: We offer our services in various locations around the world, in addition to Japan. We have more locations in the US and South Africa where your startup can thrive and grow with our support.

insights.title: Insights for Startups
insights.description: Discover key insights and solutions that help startups overcome common challenges and accelerate their growth.
